title: I got SCAMMED on the new Wish.com
description:
Welcome to the wild world of Temu.
Sony is in TROUBLE on @thisis https://youtu.be/bGumK1Brh8M
Alright, Samsung on @Denki https://youtu.be/s4oRq9lO85o

Subscribe for more! http://www.youtube.com/austinevans
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@austintechtips
Instagram: http://instagram.com/austinnotduncan
Twitter: http://twitter.com/austinnotduncan

Chapter Titles:
0:00 What is Temu?
1:10 Squishy Gorilla
1:54 Fake PS5
4:45 PS5 Cover
5:31 Makeup...?
7:36 The Demonetization Segment
8:30 Lenovo LivePods
9:53 Mini Chainsaw
12:13 Football Shoe Car
12:48 Nintendo DS Game Cart
14:07 USB Light
14:33 Switch Lite Grip
15:25 "tech"
15:44 Electric Face Slimmer
